task.title: Copy Faces
task.shortdesc: You can copy faces of 3D solids to the specified location. The selected faces are seen as an independent region or solid object. After creating copies, you can performone of the following methods:

ul.li: Basepoint: You must specify two points on the drawing. The first one is a base point; the other one determines the location of the copy.
Vector: You need to specify a point to determine the location of the copy. The base point is the original point (0,0,0).

step.cmd: Choose Modify > Solids Editing > Copy Faces from the main menu.
Select the face(s) to copy, andpress Enter.

result.p: Left: Specify the face(s) to copy (A), the base point (B), and the endpoint(C) Right: The resulting entity with the face copied
